name: Johor Visions 2022 - Cyberpunk VR
description:
As Malaysia continues to develop its infrastructure, many buildings may change or become demolished. New buildings and technology can improve quality of life, looking into the future to see what would happen to Johor in 30 years.

 Experiencing activities in VR is a growing trend in recent years as it is a tool to experience things, such as traveling and learning. VR can show the people how Johor would be in the coming years as well as the past to compare.
